data.title: Wonderful cocktails, friendly staff
data.text: Stopped here three times while visiting Montana. The best distillery in town.  Staff is friendly and knowledgable.  Great atmosphere.

data.title: Sunday Bloody Mary's!
data.text: Fabulous place to slip back in time & enjoy some amazing vodka! Bloody Mary Bar was spectacular! Between that & the sampler, there was no way we could do the Moscow Mule. We'll go back!

data.title: Great find!
data.text: We happened upon this fun tasting opportunity last week when visiting the university of Montana with our son.   While he and our daughter were not able to taste the flavored vodkas, the were able to see the distilling process.  They have 12 different flavored vodkas.  We tasted them all and ended up purchasing the cucumber (very refreshing and smooth), huckleberry, coffee and bacon infused vodkas!   Yes, the last one is bacon.    The owner, Mark, experiments with different concentrations (and in the case of bacon, different flavored, like pepper bacon or Apple smoked, and different degrees of cooking the bacon) to get the perfect infusion, and thus flavor.   The special distinction about Montana Distillery is that the infusions are all real foods, not artificial flavorings. Real berries, bacon, ginger, vanilla, etc.   Most other flavored vodkas are flavored with artificial chemicals that taste as intended.   We found these vodkas, and the custom mixed drinks, especially the  Caesar, to be strikingly authentic.   A fun place, fun atmosphere and great spirits!

data.title: Best cocktails EVER
data.text: I love to go here and enjoy the delicious drinks.  I've never been disappointed.  It's fun to watch them make drinks as a lot of personal attention is needed with each drink.  I've gone with my son during the day and they make fun and delicious mocktails.

data.title: Great little place off the beaten track
data.text: I can't believe this place has been around almost 2 years! I hadn't been in the great brick building since it was a hair salon, because it's not your typical downtown location. We really enjoyed our drinks (especially Indian Paint Brush and Outlaw if you like a touch of heat), and our bartender Casey was great. Live music Friday nights, Ladies' night Wednesday's....just a really cool gathering place with lots of seating.

data.title: Lots if flavored vodka
data.text: Bar tender was very friendly and helpful.  Bought two small bottles of flavored vodka  (bacon and pepper) Can't wait to make bloody Marys!  Nice they had small bottles for purchase.

data.title: Always a fun and welcoming place!
data.text: I love this place. We have become frequent customers.  Their vodka is natural and hands down better than any top shelf vodka. The flavors and drinks are unique and oh so yummy. Everyone from the owners to the mixologists treat you like family and always have time to say hello. The atmosphere is relaxing. The photography is beautiful  and all for sale. I recommend this place to all. There is a drink to satisfy everyone.

data.title: Love the ambiance here!
data.text: We enjoy coming to the Montana Distillery for a specialty "vodka" drink. We've been fans of Flathead vodka since it began. The owners are very nice and love to chat and get your input. Really love the ambiance of this place.

data.title: Wood, brick and a cocktail
data.text: My wife and I wanted to stop here since we learned that the distillery had opened.  Recently we were able to stop in and enjoy some cocktails while relaxing in the business.  It is located off of the beaten track, so to speak, since it is down by the railroad tracks but we liked its location.  The interior is wood and brick appointed.  The space is large with good seating either separately or at tables.  The staff was very friendly and helpful during our stay and listened to our suggestions regarding the amount of ice in our drinks.  I particularly enjoyed my Bloody Mary while my wife enjoyed all of her different cocktail choices.  We would recommend the distillery if you would like to spend some quiet time while enjoying a quality drink.
